poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: To spit and piss in pots and pits Is something Picts will have got From Rome with lemon pips and fonts. Were their pimps and panders competent translators? Likely so. Madam primps. Her man picks her A spray of pinks that prinks her bodice. Rome! The pyx of Holy Writ Till someone pricks its bubble, transmutes Its gold to lead And prints.
